column4: if ram is seated properly flush and end sealers push in both naturally while flush then your system is likely flakey due to misinstalled memory (common) or worse case scenario a bad stick.  memtest86 in grub should tell you something in about 20 minutes.  from there, if new memory, reseat, or go ahead and try and reseat the memory, and run memtest86 or so for 30 minutes if it passes ubuntu should be fine
- he said it showed up fine in bios
that doesn't rule out badly installed memory.
